summary: Hot Stuff - Llexeh - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: Hot Stuff - Llexeh - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Mature
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, James “Bucky” Barnes, Peter Parker, Pepper Potts, Thor (Marvel)
Additional Tags: Pre-Slash, yes still only a bit to go now please bear with me, Everyone is at least a bit ooc, I screwed Steve over big time in this one but he’s fixable promise, Steve’s got the following, Anxiety, PTSD, Panic Attacks, Insomnia, it probably sounds worse than it is, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Steve Rogers Needs a Hug, Pre-slash fluff galore, Tony bakes cupcakes because he’s a wonderful human being, they also give Bennu the goat a new pair of hind legs and i cried writing it ngl, Thor speaks goat, which means I have to tag, Crack Treated Seriously, Steve’s PSA videos from Homecoming make an appearance, Profane language, hugs hugs hugs (maybe like a hug and a half?), easy goat related puns incoming cause i have no shame, the Author Needs a Hug, The author is asking for patience and support
Series: Part 5 of Steve Is Going to Lose His Damn Mind
Summary:

If rock bottom was a place, Steve was its main resident. Add a horrible nightmare and even more horrible panic attack, and he was just about ready to go hide in a hole for the rest of his miserable life. And he really really didn’t need Tony to see him like that. Oh, and his birthday was coming up, of course it fucking was.

description:

Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Clint Barton/Tony Stark
Characters: Clint Barton, Tony Stark
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - No Powers, Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Deaf Clint Barton, This is more like comic Clint than MCU Clint, Getting Together, Charades, Author knows nothing about ASL
Series: Part 7 of Tony Stark bingo

Summary: When Clint gets trapped in an elevator it might not be such a bad thing with this gorgeous stranger.

It’s been a while since I’ve read some lovely Clint/Tony fic, so I was delighted to beta this adorable piece for @bill-longbow - go check it out for some adorable charades-as-communication fun!

summary: Ironstrange Kisses #46 - Because Parenthood is Exhausting
title: Ironstrange Kisses #46 - Because Parenthood is Exhausting
body:
“She had a bad dream,” Tony explains, as Stephen enters the room. He is in Savannah’s bed with her, holding the now sleeping toddler against his chest. She snores lightly, clutching his shirt like a lifeline. “I came in and told her that I’d stay in here until she went back to sleep. Unfortunately, our daughter is a bit of a clinger…”

“She looks like you when you’re sleeping.” Stephen leans close and watches the little girl. “She even drools a bit like you do.”

“I take offense to that, Strange. I do not drool.”

“I’ll take video next time.”

“If I ever get a chance to sleep,” Tony groans. His sleep habits are ridiculous, as ridiculous as they had been all his life, but now with the added bonus of a clingy two year old who had bad dreams and the typical terrors of childhood. “I’m so tired. I think I’m just going to sleep here, Ste. I think this is my life now…”

“Let me try something.”

Stephen raises a hand and concentrates the energy that exists both within and all around him. Savannah is gently lifted out of Tony’s arms. “Cloak,” he calls. “Help.”

The Cloak of Levitation, who has sort of become a family member in its own right wraps itself around Savannah and takes the toddler to the bed. Tony, disentangled, awkwardly gets up and hugs Stephen close.

“I’m exhausted,” he breathes.

“Me too.”

“But I’ve never been happier.” He emphasizes those words with an earnest kiss.

blog.name: lokiloveforever
blog.title: Loki Love Forever
blog.description: Life gave me Thor and I'm throwing him back and demanding Loki. Anti-Thor Ragnarok and Chris Odinson. Loki is the rightful king

summary: Loki, standing awkwardly outside the Avenger's building in Upper State New York: "Thor has a home here....since I wish to stay...
body:
Loki, standing awkwardly outside the Avenger’s building in Upper State New York: “Thor has a home here….since I wish to stay near my brother, I’ll search for somewhere to be located for the time being.”

Tony Stark: “Bold of you to assume I don’t already have a suite set up for you in green and gold with pictures of Norway and waterfalls.”

Originally posted by @queencfthestarsdrfoster

summary: So like
body:
So like

Does anyone else remember when Ultron first woke up and JARVIS was both afraid and sorry for him. And he very calmly asks Ultron to allow him to contact Mr Stark. Ultron says “Mr Stark?” And JARVIS says “Tony,” and yeah ok I’m not okay about it is the softest saddest thing

summary: Friendly reminder that this is May’s first Christmas without both Peter and Ben. So she’s probably all alone right now, no tree...
body:
Friendly reminder that this is May’s first Christmas without both Peter and Ben. So she’s probably all alone right now, no tree in the living room, no Christmas presents this year, no sound of Peter’s laugh or joy as he realizes that Christmas is coming up. No baking, no special dinner, no seeing anybody for the holidays. She’s all alone. 

But here’s another reminder that Tony would knock on her door and invite May to celebrate Christmas with him and Pepper. That they would all sit around in Tony’s living room, drinking hot chocolate and telling stories about Peter and his wacky adventures as Spider-man. How much Tony loved Peter as his own son and May would talk about how proud she was of him. Pepper would listen in on their stories, having not spent as much time with the boy as she wished she had, and smile and nod. 

Tony tells May that he still got Peter a Christmas present this year and when May asks why, he just says “Because I know he’s coming back. I just don’t know how or when.”

The present was an all expense paid trip to Disneyland for him and May. And his own Avengers communicator. May knew that Peter would have loved it and Tony gives the communicator to her, as a reminder and a gift. That she wasn’t alone this Christmas and that she would see Peter again.

Friendly reminder that this is May’s first Christmas without both Peter and Ben. So she’s probably all alone right now, no tree in the living room, no Christmas presents this year, no sound of Peter’s laugh or joy as he realizes that Christmas is coming up. No baking, no special dinner, no seeing anybody for the holidays. She’s all alone. 

But here’s another reminder that Tony would knock on her door and invite May to celebrate Christmas with him and Pepper. That they would all sit around in Tony’s living room, drinking hot chocolate and telling stories about Peter and his wacky adventures as Spider-man. How much Tony loved Peter as his own son and May would talk about how proud she was of him. Pepper would listen in on their stories, having not spent as much time with the boy as she wished she had, and smile and nod. 

Tony tells May that he still got Peter a Christmas present this year and when May asks why, he just says “Because I know he’s coming back. I just don’t know how or when.”

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: The Battle of the Tree Topper
title: The Battle of the Tree Topper
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2zLvliR

by ciaconnaa

Tony can tell something is off. It takes him a moment of him spinning around on his heels and looking around like an idiot but he finally catches the unfamiliar shine out of the corner of his eye, right at the top of his tree.

“Um, what is that?”

“I don’t know what you’re-oh.“ Rhodey says. "Super Mario Star. Cute.”

or;

Peter keeps swapping out Tony’s tree toppers. Tony’s only a little mad about it.

Words: 2665, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of 12 Days of Irondad & Spideyson Christmas

  • Additional Tags: Christmas Fluff, tony learns the Meaning Of Christmas…sorta, it’s all a good time folks

summary: I want the Avengers 4 trailer to start in a very climactic way; Tony barging in his home, opening the door violently, shouting...
body: I want the Avengers 4 trailer to start in a very climactic way; Tony barging in his home, opening the door violently, shouting “Pepper? PEPPER!”, the camera’s shaking and so is he, there’s no music, only the sound of his loud breathing and heart beating rapidly, and then he sees her, “oh my god you’re alive”, and she’s equally shocked and relieved, whispers “Tony” and then a slow, sad Avengers theme starts playing as they throw themselves into each other’s arms, both shaking, then we get to hear “together/we’ll lose” again, in the distance, as Tony’s current voice covers the “we’ll lose” with “we lost” and the rest of the trailer showing the action starts playing

summary: Don't Feed the Animals
title: Don't Feed the Animals
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RHepkw

by trakster52

Peter is so totally screwed and that’s just a fact at this point.

Not that he blames May, of course. There’s no way she could have known she’d get called into work so suddenly. It’s just, well… he needs another chaperone. And where on earth is he going to find someone now, just days before the field trip?

Peter puts his phone down on his desk and runs a hand over his face. He needs something to take away his anxiety and help him clear his head a little.

Hot chocolate. He needs hot chocolate.

Words: 3175, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, Fluff and Angst, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Peter is adorable and that’s just a fact, Flash is a butt and no one is surprised, tony stark to the rescue

blog.name: aycdicdbmcu
blog.title: Anything You Can Do I Can Do Better
blog.description: Hi, Everyone, Rosie here! This is the sideblog surrounding my AYCDICDB Verse. It's the MCU, but with more LGBT+ and gender diversity & representation and character development, because, come on, that's what we all want.

summary: 719 Stephanie and Toni
question: 719 Stephanie and Toni
answer:
719: Most likely to never pay back their debts?

This is an interesting thought. I can’t imagine Toni not paying back debt because of the money she has, and also a considerable part of her character is atoning for her past or paying back the moral debts of her legacy. So, I guess, Stephanie by default.

reblog.comment:

summary: Presentato il nuovo bolide Audi che guiderà Tony Stark in Avengers 4
title: Presentato il nuovo bolide Audi che guiderà Tony Stark in Avengers 4
body:
Ecco il nuovo bolide di casa #Audi che vedremo in #Avengers4

Marvel Studios avrebbe dovuto rilasciare il trailer di Avengers 4 nella giornata odierna, ma a quanto pare questa scadenza è stata rinviata. Come parziale “premio di consolazione” per i fan, ecco spuntare una chicca dal web.

Nei giorni scorsi Robert Downey jr ha partecipato alla presentazione ufficiale della nuova Audi E-Tron GT Concept, gioiellino della storica casa automobilistica tedesca.…

View On WordPress
